findings.title: ERC1400ERC20 whitelist circumvents partition restrictions
findings.description: Whitelist in ERC1400ERC20 circumvents partition restrictions, allowing unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Certificate controllers do not always constrain the last argument
findings.description: Signature manipulation vulnerability in CertificateControllerNonce and CertificateControllerSalt.

findings.title: Salt-based certificate controller is subject to signature replay
findings.description: Signature replay vulnerability in salt-based certificate controller.

findings.title: EIP-1400 is missing canTransfer* functions
findings.description: Missing canTransfer* functions in ERC1400 implementation.

findings.title: ERC777 incompatibilities
findings.description: Incompatibility with standard ERC777 contracts due to function and event name changes.

findings.title: Buffer over-read in ERC1410._getDestinationPartition
findings.description: Buffer over-read vulnerability in ERC1410._getDestinationPartition.

findings.title: ERC20/ERC777 compatibility issues
findings.description: Incompatibility with standard ERC20 and ERC777 contracts due to incorrect implementation.

findings.title: ERC777 compatibility issue: authorizeOperator and revokeOperator
findings.description: Incorrect implementation of authorizeOperator and revokeOperator in ERC777.

findings.title: Token receiver can mint gas tokens with sender's gas
findings.description: Potential for token receivers to mint gas tokens using the sender's gas.

findings.title: Missing ERC functions
findings.description: Missing ERC functions, such as isOperator(), in ERC1410 implementation.

findings.title: Inaccurate error message in ERC777ERC20.approve
findings.description: Inaccurate error message in ERC777ERC20.approve when spender is address 0.

findings.title: Non-standard treatment of a from address of 0
findings.description: Treating a from address of 0 as equivalent to msg.sender in some cases, which violates existing standards and is unexpected behavior for an ERC20 token.

findings.title: ERC1410â€™s redeem and redeemFrom should revert
findings.description: Functions silently succeed when they should probably fail by reverting.

findings.title: Global partition enumeration can run into gas limits
findings.description: The way partitions are created and removed can lead to gas limit issues.

findings.title: Optimization: redundant delete in ERC1400._removeTokenFromPartition
findings.description: Redundant deletes can be removed to save gas.

findings.title: Avoid hardcoding function selectors
findings.description: Hardcoded function selectors can be replaced with this.<method>.selector.
